about_the_game:
Have you ever thought to yourself: “This awesome viking ship that I just built in Trailmakers is missing something… like a viking.” If so, you’re in luck! With the Hat Pack, YOU can be that viking.

The Hat Pack contains 13 pieces of headwear for the characters in Trailmakers. If you purchase this pack, you will have those 13 headwear options available in the game, in addition to the 2 default ones. This DLC includes:
  • Chicken Bucket
  • Leprechaun Hat
  • Monocle and Moustache
  • Black Cowboy Hat
  • Plague Mask
  • Jack-o’-lantern
  • Roman Soldier Helmet
  • Thirst Aid Beer Helmet
  • Tiki Mask
  • Top Hat
  • Viking Helmet
  • Welding Helmet
  • And Wizard Hat

Purchasing the Hat Pack supports the development of Trailmakers and future games from Flashbulb. Thanks for the support :)

name: Trailmakers: Hat Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: i5-4440 (3.1 GHz quad-core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Hat Pack contains 13 pieces of headwear for the characters in Trailmakers.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
